body.name: Microfiber Spray Mop for Floor Cleaning Wet Dry, 360 Degree Spin Dust Home Kitchen Hardwood Floor Flat Mops with 360ML Refillable Bottle Include 4 Microfiber Reusable Pads 1 Scrubber and 1 Mop Holder

features: Profession Versatile Spray Mop - Harmless to floor, Our microfiber spray mop with light weight and made by high quality aluminum easy and simple for cleaning hardwood floor, laminate wood floor, ceramic tiles and etc.No bending, no bucket, all you have to do is press the spray trigger of floor mop to get the cold water mist you need.

Easy and Simple to Use - The dry wet mop head can rotate 360 degrees, making floor cleaning even more hassle-free and easy to control. Our microfiber mop can easily be maneuvered into all corners and hard-to-reach areas. Remove dust from under your sofa, bed, around table legs, or any other tight spot, and it works well on many surfaces, even the most stubborn dirt can be dealt with quickly and easily.

Efficient Floor Cleaning - No more heavy messy bucket, our spray mop come with a 360ML water tank, you could fill with your favorite cleaner, just make sure clean the water tank when you finished the cleaning. Simply push the trigger on the handle, it turns water to water mist evenly, save water and make mopping efficiency with minimize efforts than the regular mop. (Not recommended for strong acidic liquids)

Premium 4 Reusable Dry & Wet Microfiber Pads - Mop pads have millions of microscopic fibers, which is super absorbent and can effectively grab debris, dust, and hair. The pad absorbs the water quickly, floor dries in minutes and there is no watermarks/shadows on the floor after cleaning. It comes with 4 microfiber pads, which is machine washable and reusable, no need to constantly buying the disposable cleaning pads anymore.

Extra Scraper and Mop Holder - The multifunctional scraper is given to squeeze water on the spray mop, dirt and stains on floor/tile, the side of the comb shape can remove the hair on the floor mop, which make the cleaning job much easier. The mop holder no need drilling, easy hanging mops and brooms, saves space for the house

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The cleaning model of ordinary mop and bucket makes us too tired, why not try the integrated water spray mop we design for you The all-in-one water spray mop supports both wet and dry use.Squeezeing water spray can be completed with one hand. The sprayed water is fan-shaped and can fully cover the dirty floor.The large-capacity 360ML bottle allows you to avoid frequent refilling. In addition to adding water, you can also freely add detergent to achieve different cleaning methods.The scraper can drain the dirty water on the mop cloth, and can also clean the hair on it and the sticky objects on the floor, so that your hands can always be kept clean and hygienic.Free up more space in your home with our included mop clip for easy storage.

Wet&Dry Use DARIS SPRAY MOP can not only clean wet ground, but also dirty and hairy ground. Squeeze Grip Press with one hand to get water out. At the same time, you can control the amount of water sprayed by controlling your force of pressing. 360° Rotating Head The 360° rotating head allows you to bypass obstacles encountered during cleaning and do not omit every corner of the house.The 180° foldable design allows the pole to fold 180° around the panel, making it effortless to clean gaps under cabinets. Squeeze Fan-shaped Mist Gently press the handle to make the nozzle spray a wide range of fan-shaped water mist. The matching 16*5.7 inch panel can clean the floor in a wide range, saving your time and energy.

Mop Clip The mop clip can store the mop and hang the mop cloth, which can truly serve your life and save your living space. 360ML large capacity bottle 360ML Large-capacity bottle keeps you from refilling water frequently. You can also combine with detergent for a free cleaning style. Multifunctional Scraper The scraper can remove the sewage and hair on the mop cloth, and can pick up the chewing gum stuck on the floor, so as not to get your hands dirty. It can also be buckled on the mop handle to prevent it from being missed after you finish cleaning. 4 Pcs Multi-fiber clothes This multi-fiber cloth is really durable with an average lifespan of 2 months,therefore you don't have to buy new cloth frequently for 12 consecutive months. Moreover, the multi-fiber material can absorb 7 times its own weight of water effectively.

Microfiber Pads These microfiber pads support hand&machine washing. Have a wash, dirty gone. DARIS SPRAYING MOP 3 x High Strength Aluminum Poles 1 x 360ML Water Tank 1 x 360° Rotating Mop Head 1 x Multifunctional Scraper 1 x#304 Stainless Steel Mop Clip 4 x Reusable Mop Pads(2+2)

Multifunctional Spray Mop Floors of different materials cannot affect the dazzling performance of Daris water spray mop, because it can effectively clean almost all floors and window including laminate floors, hardwood floors, tiles, marble floors, and cement floors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and Easy to Use!
reviews.reviewText: I love this mop! The pads are velcroed to the mop for easy removal and reapplication. And since the pads are machine washable, I just throw them all in the washer. No messy wringing. I love that SIX pads are included, because it takes 2-3 pads to clean my floors. I throw those in the washer and still have a few to use if I don't wash them right away. I'm a weirdo and choose not to use the spray option (I mix my own cleaner and sprinkle it around on the floor before I mop). I do this because the spray options on all mops don't put out enough in one spray. Just my opinion. Overall, though, I'm super happy with this mop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great buy and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: After doing much research on spray mops, I bought this one for $18. After getting it home and filling it with some Murphy’s oil soap and hot water I sprayed and mopped and it was great, my floor got clean and it wasn’t soaked, and it dried fairly quickly. This is very easy to use. I like the idea the microfiber mop heads are easy to apply and washable. I have wood floors in my kitchen and dining room and this is so easy to just grab and fill, I don’t have to go around using towels to dry the floor like I did with my old mop. I would highly recommend. I’ve already told several people about this spray mop because I was so happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: This mop isn't exactly heavy duty, but the light weight makes it easy to handle. It's great that it comes with 4 pads, but I wish they were white so that I could tell when they're dirty. Not difficult to assemble even though there were no instructions. It has a very small water container, but it was enough to mop a couple rooms. There's a little gadget included that you use to clean the hair and debris off the pad, and to my surprise, it works very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable AND worth it
reviews.reviewText: This was such an affordable mop and seems to get the trick done. Love that the mop heads and washable/reusable. The spray function works great and has a wide range.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for spot cleaning of floors
reviews.reviewText: I needed a tool to use between full mopping of my floors with the "Big" mop. This fit the bill perfectly and I can say it is very easy to use and works great.Once I noticed that the assembly instructions were on the Box it went together very quickly. It sure is nice to have something that is simple to use.In all I'm very happy with it and find it to be a great value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Compact and Slim - Doesn't clean well
reviews.reviewText: I do like that this Wet Spray Mop fits anywhere making it easy to store. I don't like that cleaning liquid compartment is so small and the spray sheds a lot of water. I also have to mop numerous times for it to clean a simple spill. Nothing compares to my Shark.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well thought out and versatile.
reviews.reviewText: Just used my new mop. I like the maneuverability of the swiveling head and the fine spray of the cleaner and easy pull of the trigger. I got this one because it also came with a squeegee and well thought-out anti-gravitational straw dispenser so when it is tipped up the cleaner still comes out and I can use it on Windows. Feels a bit flimsy so I'm not sure how long it will last but so far, so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have 2 kids and 5 dogs. My floors get messy but I don't want to have to mop all the time. I use to have the Swiffer version but the product was sticky. I like that I get to use my own product so I did vinegar, water, and lemongrass essential oil - it's all natural and safe for kids and pets and bonus lemongrass essential oil helps keep bugs away and I can easily refill as needed. The extra pads are great and go right in the washer so no need to keep purchasing disposable ones
Me encanta, puedo lavar el moop y volverlo a utilizar. Súper practico y de buen material.
Passe vraiment partout sous les meubles
Avec ce balais passé de temps en temps passer la serpillère n'est même plus vraiment utile le sol reste toujours propre en clin d'oeil je n'arriverais plus a me passer de ce balais.

Me ha sorprendido lo bien que funciona, lo facil y comodo que gira, lo bien que tira agua pulverizada. No querrás otra mopa. Tambien me encanta lo facil que se acopla y desacopla la microfibra, nunca he tenido una mopa tan comoda. Lo que no sé si me convence es esas mopas de microfibra para mi suelo de pvc imitacion madera, estoy acostumbrado a terrazo que se ve mejor si una mopa limpia bien o no. Es una impresion mia que ese suelo es como mas "sucio" al tener cierto relieve
Perfetto per dare una rinfrescata alla casa e per pulire le finestre
